spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

Cowl of the Swift Fox

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,580 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,383 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 128,227 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

Transmogrified to:
Cloak of the Swift Fox

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 4,093 to 5,003 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 5,003 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for spell casting instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
